name: Accelerated First-Year Yiddish
description: Six lecture hours a week for one semester, with optional laboratory available. Prerequisite: Two high school units or the equivalent in another foreign language, or consent of instructor.

name: Accelerated Second-Year Yiddish
description: Six lecture hours a week for one semester, with optional laboratory available. Prerequisite: Yiddish 604 or an appropriate score on the placement test.
